casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

March 10, 2008

[Cite as 03/10/2008 Case Announcements, 2008-Ohio-995.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2007-0114. Cleveland Constr., Inc. v. Cincinnati.

Hamilton App. No. C-050749, C-050779, and C-050888, 169 Ohio App.3d 627, 2006-Ohio-6452. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Hamilton County. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for leave to file additional authority,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is granted. Appellant shall file its citation to the additional authority within 7 days of the date of this entry.
